features: PROFESSIONAL AND COMFORTABLE: Ergonomic desk chair with layered body pillows and padded armrests
AIR LUMBAR TECHNOLOGY: Lumbar cushions pivot when you move to provide back support and help improve posture
EXECUTIVE STYLE: Bonded leather with contrast stitching
ALL DAY COMFORT: Seat-side cable-actuated levers offer convenient height and tilt adjustments
SMOOTH ROLLING: Multi-surface, dual-wheel designer casters make it easy to move around
body.description: The Serta Executive Office Chair effectively responds to your movement to keep you comfortable all day long. This ergonomic office chair comes with AIR Lumbar Technology, a support feature that flexes and pivots with your body as you lean and twist to ensure proper posture. Layered body pillows and padded armrests provide a serene and tranquil seating experience. The perforated center area of the seatback adds refreshing breathability, and ergonomic seat-side levers offer convenient height and tilt adjustments. This desk chair is upholstered in soft, supple bonded leather and features contrast stitching for a stylish touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft like clouds
reviews.reviewText: I work from home a lot and my back was killing me. Switched to this chair and it’s made a huge diff! So plush and comfy and looks great too. Barely any assembly involved and just great quality chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, but smaller
reviews.reviewText: Made for smaller frame people, my wife who is 5'2" fits great but my lanky 6 foot self does not, good thing it wasn't for me lol. Super comfy tho!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable, difficult to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this chair is very good and it is extremely comfortable (to me anyway). It offer excellent support for your back and is an attractive design. The biggest challenge is in assembly. The instructions say to attach the arms to the seat 1st then bolt the back on. When you follow this procedure, the holes on the back don't line up. My suggestion is, loosely bolt the arms to the back, then bolt the arms to the seat. Other than that, It's a great chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good chair for all day working
reviews.reviewText: I should have read all the reviews before buying this chair. It came nicely package. But did not want to go together. Screws would not go into pre-made holes properly. Some holes were sunk way in the fabric making the arms not sit right. The entire chair was crooked after it was put together. Leaned to one side. I was also expecting great comfort since this is a serta not the case use it was soft and had cushion but not a lot of support. Returned and after alot if research ordered another chair Clatina Mellet cheaper price and way better support and made way better. Would not recommend this serta chair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cushioned with lower back support
reviews.reviewText: I have previously used a gray Serta chair for a years (that I loved - so comfy), and was needing a new one for my home office. I wanted a cute one but without sacrificing the comfort and support. I’m glad I found this. I can sit for long periods of time and still feel good. Thanks for a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and pretty
reviews.reviewText: This chair feels very sturdy. It is comfortable, feels supportive of my back in all the right places. Best of all, since I often sit with one leg tucked under me or even in half lotus, I’m delighted to discover that it is wide enough. Great chair! Better than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Excellent chair, but still waiting for a replacement part.
reviews.reviewText: purchased this chair, but you can tell it was made in china.The bottom seat cushion was not manufactured correctly. one of the bolt 'sockets' where you bolt it together was installed crocked, and partly filled with..... something.....As per instructions, I called the support number, told them and sent a picture of the issue.They said they would send a new seat cushion. it has been at least 2 weeks, and I have not received it yet.I assembled the chair, and am using it, but not 'fully' assembled, since one load bearing bolt cannot be installed. hoping the chair does not completely break before the replacement part comes in.As far as the comfort, it is second to none. I just wish the manufacturing process was better, and the customer service was better.If I don't get the replacement cushion in the next week, I'll be returning it to amazon for a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fácil de entender las instrucciones y colocar sus partes juntas. Estable y se acomoda a mi necesidad.

La compre en el 2019, me costo 7 mil pesos mexicanos, pero en un año ya estaba descarapelada toda, si es muy cómoda pero no es de cuero genuino, es sintético. Veo el costo actual de 12 mil y por esa cantidad puedes comprar algo mucho mejor en piel genuina y mayor calidad en acabados.
Awesome office chair. Well made and easy to put together

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena relación costo - beneficio (la compre por $500)
reviews.reviewText: Un día en la mañana de casualidad entre y la vi en $500 pesos, no lo creí y me arrepiento de haber solo comprado una; los materiales se sienten muy bien, la silla es realmente comoda, tenemos mas de 3 meses usandola y los cojines no se han deformado, solos el plástico de los brazos no se ve tan bien pero se sienten resistentes. Muy sencilla de armar.

Not perfectly happy but will keep this chair. Package arrived on time and without damage of any sort. Assembly was simple with good instructions. Quality of materials seems appropriate for this price range. This chair tempted me as soon as I saw it (I'm a sucker for good design). For my body type (I'm 5' 8" and 145 lbs) the chair is very comfortable for bum, back and arms. As I do a lot of reading at my computer, I need soft and relatively substantial armrests which this chair has. My only disappointment is that the headrest is too far back and as it is not adjustable, for me it's really of little use unless I add a pillow and slide my bum forward. I live in a smallish town so couldn't test a lot of chairs in person so did what research I could online and then ordered through Amazon. My first choice had to be returned (uncomfortable). If you live in a larger city and can shop in person, I'd certainly recommend doing that regardless of who you buy from.
